home.content:
# Hello, Wrold!
---

Welcome to FEWD!

This document will serve as your **source of truth** for all class materials. 

Here's a breakdown of the most important content.

#### [Class Schedule and Location](#class-schedule-and-location)
Find information about where our physical class location

#### [Exit Tickets](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1-0MZJD6DCRoxNTIDmGYvroSjytUtm2HpJ8AQ46k7d0g/viewform?c=0&w=1)
Help us get better at helping you! Please fill our this exit ticket after class each night to help us understand how we can improve our lecture game.

#### [Lecture Notes](#lecture-notes)
Just a list of all the lecture notes prepared for the duration of the course.

#### [Homework Assignments](#homework-assignments)
List of all assigned homeworks + due dates.

#### [Office Hours Schedule](#office-hours-schedule)
This is a living document. Please find our weekly office hours schedule here.

class-schedule-and-location.content: # Class Schedule and Location --- ### General Our class will meet on **Mondays** and **Wednesdays** from **6:30PM to 9:30PM** in **Room 3B**. ### Class Duration **Wednesday** June 29th — **Monday** September 14th. ### Location

homework-assignments.content:
# Homework Assignments
---

Homework will be assigned (almost) every week. Typically, it will be **assigned on Mondays** and it will be due the **following Monday** by **6:30PM**. 

If you do not turn the homework in on time, we will most likely ask that you come to office hours for detailed feedback on your assignment.

### How to submit homework

1. Do the homework.
2. Push to Github (you should always be version controlling your work).
3. Using [Gitbot](http://gitbot.co), deploy your assignment to the interwebs.
4. Ping the HomeworkBot in slack with the URL of your deployed solution.

### Homework Assignments

Please find all homework assignments here in reverse chronological order.

1. [Class 0 Homework Assignment](https://fewdmaterials.github.io/FEWD629_Lecture0_hwk/)
